description: In this course, we examine the evidence for the Biblical view on dinosaurs. Did they die out recently or millions of years ago? What does the Bible say about dinosaurs? Would they even fit on the Ark? Have people lived with dinosaurs? If you are curious about the answers to these questions, this course is for you. We invite you to examine the evidence for yourself.
title: 103  -  Dinosaurs: Evolved or Created?
